featured.text: Actually, one of their main interests was the art of deception.

definition.zh_def: 欺騙，故意誤導他人以隱瞞真相或達成某種目的的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of deceiving or misleading someone, often to conceal the truth or achieve a specific goal.
definition.example: His deception was uncovered when the truth finally came to light.
